descriptions.description: Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11 LocationFaker is compatible with iOS8 and 9(iPhone6/6s, iPhone6/6s Plus)

If you purchase "LocationFaker", you can use "LocationFaker8" for free Also available, LocationFaker for iOS 5,6,7 You can change you Location in any app. Like: We Chat, Facebook,Find My iPhone... Just select the location in the map, and turn on the switch New app on your home screen.
